title: okay i need help now
body: so each day i open up lol right i go to play a game i wait in queue for a while like you do i find a game click on it go into champion select chose my champion then the game starts i wait 5 mins for the lol client to open the it takes 2 min to show my champion  in loading but no other champions then when it gets over 50 %    it dc but if i wait 20 mins before going into queue it load fine so help cos im getting leave busters and its pissing me off riot fix your game
